name: Game Maker Studio Engine: 8 Bit Space Invaders
name_original: Game Maker Studio Engine: 8 Bit Space Invaders
description:
Game Maker Studio Engine: 8 Bit Space Invaders is a shooter game developed by playhark. It was originally released in 2017.
Game Maker Studio Engine: 8 Bit Space Invaders is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
